entry.title: Release notes from syft - v0.37.3: pass notarize arg, not original archive (#793)
Release notes from syft - v0.37.2: repackage all file in notarization temp dir (not from tar output) (#792)
Release notes from syft - v0.37.1: tput requires explicit terminal type in CI (#791)
Release notes from syft - v0.37.0: Normalize snapshot and release artifacts (#789)
entry.content:
• refactor signing steps in release/snapshot workflows

  • show signing logs on snapshot or release failure

Signed-off-by: Alex Goodman alex.goodman@anchore.com

  • update cli tests to account for new goreleaser build names

  • fix acceptance test to use new snapshot bin path

  • add notarization

  • address review comments

entry.title: Release notes from google-cloud-go - kms kms/v1.2.0
Release notes from google-cloud-go - channel channel/v1.3.0
entry.content:
Features

  • channel: Change description for GCP ProvisionedService.provisioning_id value feat: Update year from 2021 to 2022 (2fae584)

entry.title: Release notes from external-secrets - v0.3.11
entry.content:
Image: ghcr.io/external-secrets/external-secrets:v0.3.11

Changes

  • You can now provide CA for Yandex' Lockbox provider
  • Update go to 1.17
  • Multiple minor fixes

entry.title: Release notes from external-secrets - v0.4.1
entry.content:
Image: ghcr.io/external-secrets/external-secrets:v0.4.1

Changes

  • Site docs also supports versioning
  • Just some fixes so we can release the helm chart

entry.title: Release notes from external-secrets - v0.4.0
entry.content:
Image: ghcr.io/external-secrets/external-secrets:v0.4.0

Changes

  • Added generic webhook provider
  • Try to address some complexity code smells
  • e2e testing for gcp Workload Identity
  • Improved docs
  • HashiCorp Vault provider: add support for mount path for LDAP and JWT auth methods
  • Use MethodGet field instead of hardcoded string literal
  • Improve and standardize our unit tests for some providers
  • Replace Oracle Vault with secrets package (actually retrieve the value now)
  • fix: force ownership when merging secrets
  • GCP promoted to stable (also new e2e tests for GCP)
  • Support for eventual consistency in Vault Enterprise
  • Optimise patching so as changes only happen with something changes
  • Added managed e2e test framework (for managed clusters)
  • fix: ensure that data is being deleted when using templates
  • feat(provider): implement fake provider

entry.title: Release notes from google-cloud-go - storage storage/v1.20.0
entry.content:
Features

  • storage/internal: Update definition of RewriteObjectRequest to bring to parity with JSON API support (#5447) (7d175ef)
